ability.Wise Mentor: Type effect of Psychic-type and Ground-type moves is always 1.
ability.Nature Blessing: Heals 1/8 of its maximum HP at the end of each turn when in grassy terrain.

Healing Touch.effect: Restores 10% of the target's max HP but removes the user's status conditions.

Nature Wrath.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Philosopher Strike.effect: The user's next move deals double damage if the opponent has a status condition.

Cave Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
